love the mod, just want to say that it seems the stats arent original. many things have been changed. like only the circassian cavalry has 12 morale, but here many units have the 12 morale, including armenian archers. and the reload time is wrong too. armenian archers have 15 reload skill. besides the libyan koluglu seem to fire mounted too, they only have dismounted fire, and they can form the diamond formation but in this mod they cant. i used this chart to check the stats, http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?t=241293 , even hayduit irregulars have been given 40 reload skill but in the original they have only 20. although the units are more powerful here i really want to get my hands on the real thing.
